name: Apple___Apple_scab
cause: Fungus Venturia inaequalis. Favorable conditions are cool, wet weather.
cure: Use fungicides and resistant apple varieties. Prune and destroy infected leaves.
html:
Crop: Apple
Disease: Apple_scab

Cause of disease:
Fungus Venturia inaequalis. Favorable conditions are cool, wet weather.

How to prevent/cure the disease:
Use fungicides and resistant apple varieties. Prune and destroy infected leaves.

name: Apple___Black_rot
cause: Caused by the fungus Botryosphaeria obtusa.
cure: Prune and remove infected areas. Apply fungicides during the growing season.
html:
Crop: Apple
Disease: Black_rot

Cause of disease:
Caused by the fungus Botryosphaeria obtusa.

How to prevent/cure the disease:
Prune and remove infected areas. Apply fungicides during the growing season.

name: Apple___Cedar_apple_rust
cause: Fungus Gymnosporangium juniperi-virginianae. Requires junipers as an alternate host.
cure: Remove nearby juniper hosts. Use resistant varieties and fungicides.
html:
Crop: Apple
Disease: Cedar_apple_rust

Cause of disease:
Fungus Gymnosporangium juniperi-virginianae. Requires junipers as an alternate host.

How to prevent/cure the disease:
Remove nearby juniper hosts. Use resistant varieties and fungicides.

No disease present.

cure: Remove infected wood. Avoid injuries to vines.

Remove infected wood. Avoid injuries to vines.
